Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 230.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 5472 Crenshaw Boulevard in Los Angeles, California, as the "Congressmen Julian C. Dixon Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 5472 Crenshaw Boulevard in Los Angeles, California, as the Congressman Julian C. Dixon Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 5472 Crenshaw Boulevard in Los Angeles, California, as the "Congressmen Julian C. Dixon Post Office Building".
